sane.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: able to think in a normal and reasonable way
sane.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: He seems perfectly sane  (=completely sane) to me.
No sane person would want to kill a baby.
sane.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: reasonable and based on sensible thinking
sane.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: a sane and sensible approach to gun control
